TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMetaDocumentRetriever

Docs.summary: Defines the interface for retrieving authentication metadata documents from a server. The interface is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetData (Uri url, bool bypassCache, out string publicKeyDocument);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetData(class System.Uri url, bool bypassCache, [out] string& publicKeyDocument) cil managed
Public Sub GetData (url As Uri, bypassCache As Boolean, ByRef publicKeyDocument As String)
public: void GetData(Uri ^ url, bool bypassCache, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % publicKeyDocument);

Docs.param: The URL of the location where the metadata document is located.
true to bypass a cached version of the metadata document; false to use a cached document, if available.
Docs.summary: Gets an authentication metadata document from the specified location. The method is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
